mainPage.heroSubtitle: Automate your cryptocurrency trading with ease

features.exchangeTradingDesc: Fully integrated with MEXC exchange for efficient trading operations, providing a seamless trading experience.
features.oneTimeTradingDesc: Capability for single purchase transactions followed by sales at a specified profit percentage, offering flexibility in trading.
features.autoTradeOnRiseDesc: Automatically executes additional purchases and sales as the market value increases, optimizing profits during market upswings.
features.autoBuyOnFallDesc: Intelligent system for automatically buying additional assets when their prices fall, enabling effective market dip investments.
features.configurableSettingsDesc: Provides flexibility in trading by allowing users to customize all percentage values and trading parameters for tailored control.
features.telegramControlDesc: Convenient bot management and trade monitoring through Telegram integration, making trading accessible on the go.
features.freeTrialDesc: Try all the functionalities of the bot with a 2-day free trial, giving users a hands-on experience before commitment.

tariffsPage.title: Our Tariffs
tariffsPage.trialDescription: Experience all the benefits of our Premium tariff for free for 2 days.
tariffsPage.premiumDescription: Get full access to our exclusive features and support.
